entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
